text: phtoytowvinh puokke ban niyeay( daoy bdeseth) tha (kompir kuor an nih) kuchea pheap chrabaukachrabl nei kar ylsabde min pit ryyke ( mou ham meat) ban bradit vea laeng ryyka ke kreante chea kviniponth mneak bonnaoh . dau che neah chaur anak neamk aoy yeung nouv mou chi hsaa t namuoy dauch avei delke ban banhchoun aoy puok moun
